get.description:
Returns a list of currency rates. against the specified quote currency.\
Ex: 1 EUR is exchangeable for 9.5 NOK. EUR is the base currency, NOK is the quote currency.

**NOTE**: Rates are updated approximately at 10:00 on weekdays.

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description:
ISO 4217: alpha 3-letter string e.g ```NOK```.\
Available values: NOK, SEK, DKK, EUR, GBP for quote currency

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: The API key from your app page in DNB Developer.

get.description:
Convert from one currency to another.\
Example 1: USD/convert/EUR?buyAmount=200\
Reads as: Transfer rates, buying 200 USD from a EUR account.\
Example 2: USD/convert/EUR?sellAmount=200\
Reads as: Transfer rates, buying USD from a EUR account, spending 200 EUR.\
Either buy amount or sell amount has to be present. Sending both is not allowed.

parameters.name: rateType
parameters.description:
Type of rate.\
TRANSFER (default) is used for electronic transfer of currencies.\
 CASH is used for physical transactions

parameters.name: buyAmount
parameters.description: The amount of baseCurrency to buy/aquire/credit. buyAmount/sellAmount can't be set at the same time.

parameters.name: sellAmount
parameters.description: The amount of baseCurrency to sell/transfer/debit.

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description:
ISO-4217 Currency code for the request origin.\
Doing a transaction between two currencies might have a slightly different rate depending on the country/branch doing the exchange. Default is NOK.\
Available values : NOK, SEK, DKK, EUR, GBP

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: The API key from your app page in DNB Developer.

denominatorCurrency.description:
Describes the fraction and the direction of `rate`.

`numerator / denominator` in the example `NZD / USD` makes the currency pair.\
Useful for cross currency - when both `buyCurrency` and `sellCurrency` are different from `quoteCurrency`.

`denominatorCurrency` will have the same value as `buyCurrency` or `sellCurrency`.

rate.description:
Rate where the `unit` is 1.

Note: Will be quoted based on `quoteCurrency`.\

rateType.description: Can be either TRANSFER or CASH

rateWithUnit.description:
Rate is multiplied by `unit`. When `unit` is `1`, this value will be the same as `rate`.

For some combinations of currencies, the unit is 1, others 100.

Note: Will be quoted based on `quoteCurrency`.\

updatedDate.description: Date when the rate was last refreshed.

buyRateTransfer.description: Rate the customer gets for buying the `baseCurrency` (transfer).

sellRateTransfer.description: Rate the customer gets for selling the `baseCurrency` (transfer).

midRate.description: Middle rate for the exchange from `baseCurrency` to `quoteCurrency` (transfer).

previousMidRate.description: Middle rate for the day before `updatedDate` (transfer).

buyRateCash.description: Rate the customer gets for buying the `baseCurrency` (cash).

sellRateCash.description: Rate the customer gets for selling the `baseCurrency` (cash).

code.description: Six digit error code referencing a specific error for an API.

path.description: Requested path that caused the error.

detail.description: Details about the cause of this error (or errors).

doc.description: URI to developer documentation for this error.

updatedDate.description:
Date and time when the rate was last refreshed.

Notation as defined by [RFC 3339, section 5.6](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc3339#section-5.6).\

buyRateCash.description: Rate the customer gets for buying the `baseCurrency` (`CASH`).

buyRateTransfer.description: Rate the customer gets for buying the `baseCurrency` (`TRANSFER`).

midRate.description: Middle rate for the exchange from `baseCurrency` to `quoteCurrency`.

previousMidRate.description: Middle rate for the day before `updatedDate`.

sellRateCash.description: Rate the customer gets for selling the `baseCurrency` (`CASH`).

sellRateTransfer.description: Rate the customer gets for selling the `baseCurrency` (`TRANSFER`).
